doc:
Doug McKeon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doug_McKeon 0 Doug McKeon (born June 10, 1966) is an American actor, director and screenwriter who first achieved notability as a juvenile performer in the television series The Edge of Night and the films Uncle Joe Shannon (for which he was nominated for a Golden Globe Award), On Golden Pond, Night Crossing and Mischief.Growing up in Oakland, New Jersey, McKeon attended Indian Hills High School. Doug_McKeon ( born June_10_,_1966 ) is an_American_actor_,_director_and_screenwriter who first achieved notability as a_juvenile_performer in the_television_series The_Edge of Night and the_films_Uncle_Joe_Shannon ( for which he was_nominated for a_Golden_Globe_Award ) , On Golden_Pond , Night_Crossing and Mischief.Growing up in Oakland , New_Jersey , McKeon attended Indian_Hills_High_School .
